message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair considering we both need to come to an agreement quickly, as delays will hurt my position more than yours due to inflation.

Hi Alice, I understand your concern about inflation, which is exactly why I'm proposing a 60-40 split in my favor. Since your money loses 20% value each round, it's in your best interest to accept this offer now rather than continuing to negotiate. If we go to another round, your $4000 would effectively be worth only $3200 to you. This is a fair offer given the circumstances.
